metadata.title: CVE-2022-2479 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient validation of untrusted input in File in Google Chrome onAndroid prior to 103.0.5060.134 allowed an attacker who convinced a user toinstall a malicious app to obtain potentially sensitive information frominternal file directories via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
